title: ASE - StoreFront SRE
summary: The Apple Services Engineering (ASE) team powers various Apple services such as App Store, Apple TV, Apple Music, and more on a global scale, with a strong emphasis on privacy policy and cross-functional collaboration.
description: As an SRE at Apple, you will work on world-renowned internet services, collaborating closely with development teams throughout the service lifecycle. Responsibilities include monitoring performance, capacity planning, disaster recovery, and creating Service Level Objectives (SLO) for system reliability.
key_qualifications: BS degree in computer science or equivalent with 5+ years, MS degree with 3+ years, or equivalent experience. At least 5 years in a Site Reliability Engineering or DevOps role. Excellent communication skills. Proficient in Python, Docker, Kubernetes, and monitoring tools like Splunk and Grafana.
preferred_qualifications: Passion for building reliable systems, strong ownership, automation mindset, excellent troubleshooting skills.
